videos.description: ESPN Bills reporter Mike Rodak awards his game ball to Sammy Watkins and ESPN Texans reporter Tania Ganguli hands hers to Chris Polk for their performances in the Bills' 30-21 win over the Texans.
videos.headline: Watkins, Polk earn game balls for Bills, Texans
